channel.title: Entertainment
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Entertainment, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: “Landman”: Sam Elliott's T.L. Cries After Getting into a Fight About Losing His Infant Daughter: 'It Shattered Me'
item.description: T.L. (Elliott) throws a punch at an old colleague in the Dec. 21 episode, which prompts a teary-eyed confession to his son (Billy Bob Thornton)

item.title: Nicki Minaj Arrives Hand-in-Hand with Erika Kirk at Turning Point Event Before Praising Trump as 'Handsome' and 'Dashing'
item.description: The rapper told Charlie Kirk's widow why she started embracing Trump during AmericaFest on Dec. 21

item.title: James Ransone, Actor Known for Roles in“ The Wire” and “It: Chapter Two”, Dies by Suicide at 46
item.description: Ransone played the character Ziggy Sobotka in the hit HBO series 'The Wire,' and the elder version of Eddie Kaspbrak in 'It: Chapter Two'

item.title: Kelly Osbourne Hangs with Rarely Seen Brother Louis and Son Sidney to Cheer on Late Dad Ozzy's Favorite Soccer Team
item.description: The siblings made an appearance in Birmingham, England, to watch their father's hometown team, Aston Villa, triumph over Manchester United

item.title: 'The Wire' Star James Ransone Dead at 46 After Apparent Suicide
item.description: James Ransone -- an actor best known for his role in the hit show "The Wire" -- has died by suicide, according to the Los Angeles Medical Examiner ......
